p: The enzyme kinetic assay was conducted under five different substrate concentrations and three varying concentrations of compound 35. We used the Michaelis-Menten equation to find the values of V MAX and K M; and with these, the Lineweaver-Burk graph was built. Compound 35 showed a decrease of enzymatic V MAX and an increase in K M, presenting the behaviour of a competitive inhibitor ( Fig 8A and 8B). The K i value was 3.06 (± 0.38) μmol L -1.
